alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 9:07AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cattaraugus, southwestern Erie and Chautauqua Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 906 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 49 miles northwest of Lake Erie State Park to near Girard. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Lackawanna, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, Evans, Eden, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Falconer, Angola, Mayville, Clymer, North Collins, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Woodlawn Beach State Park and SUNY Fredonia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
